title: MD
biography: Habiba Zehi Ben Romdhane is a Tunisian medical professional. She was Tunisia's health minister. She took office in the interim Tunisian government which began on January 28, 2011, after protests had dislodged a longstanding authoritarian government.
aiSummary: Habiba Ben Romdhane is a epidemiology specialist with an H-index of 35 at University of Tunis (Member). Has been published in The Lancet, Nature, The Lancet Diabetes & Endocrinology. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
